translation: They say, "This universe is without truth, without a moral basis, without a God, brought about by mutual union, with lust as its cause; what else?"
commentary: 16.8 Untruth without truth? unreputable without (moral) basis? And they? Jagat the world? They say say? Anishvaram without a God? brought about by mutual union? What what? Elsewhere else? kamahaitukam with lust for its cause.Commentary They hold that the universe is without any substratum or support or an undying basic reality
